data.name: Witness of the Night
data.detailed_description:
Witness of the Night is a new horror adventure in which you will have to survive the night in the old observatory, plunge into the creepy memories of the main hero and uncover the mystery of signals from space.

Danger in the DARK


SURREAL ATMOSPHERE


STORY
You play as Eddie, a man who has had a passion for cosmos since an early age. One day his friend asks him to help her find a mysterious signal from outer space. As Eddie searches for the signal mystical events begin to unfold in the observatory as well as beyond.






FEATURES

- Use the observatory computer and print out images of mysterious radiation from space.
- Various atmospheric locations.
- Horror built around a sense of the mystery.
- A short experience that can be completed in an hour.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Specified hardware on which the game was tested, but most likely it will work on weaker machines too.
